caption.p: A, Kaplan‐Meier plot of OS in all patients; B, patients with AML by cytogenetic risk and C, patients aged ≥55 years with and without censoring for patients receiving a transplant. Adv, adverse; AML, acute myeloid leukemia; CI, confidence interval; NE, not evaluable; Fav, favorable; Int, intermediate; OS, overall survival [Color figure can be viewed at http://wileyonlinelibrary.com]
